resources.string: Mahan is a young and motive android developer which started this path with learning Java Core\nand then migrating to Kotlin.\nThese days Mahan is focused on Android modern UI development kit, Jetpack Compose.
is a Clean Architecture App and developed by Jetpack Compose to demonstrate Retrofit library.

The goal of Jet Word is to guess english words that are already Messed Up.
 
Easy: 5 words with the maximum length of 4

Medium: 10 words with the maximum length of 8

Hard: 15 words with no length limit

Arcade Mode: For those who think they are a dictionary
